UniprotID	Q8TAV4-2
Accession	Q8TAV4;B4E285;Q5JS35
EntryName	STML3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Stomatin-like protein 3 (SLP-3)
GeneName	STOML3
Length	282
Function	Required for the function of many mechanoreceptors. Modulate mechanotransduction channels and acid-sensing ion channels (ASIC) proteins. Potentiates PIEZO1 and PIEZO2 function by increasing their sensitivity to mechanical stimulations.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
Disorder	
ExposeBuried
